ComicInfo.Title: The Man Comes Around Part 2; Portland, 1940; Last Night; Essence of Life; The Producers; Greed; Canadian Vampire; Bleeding Kansas; Lost Colony; The Man Comes Around Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: You are cordially invited to a party—to die for! This special features eight amazing stories set in the world of American Vampire, with “lost tales,” new characters and old favorites. Don’t miss these stories brought to you by series creators Scott Snyder and Rafael Albuquerque, as well as other awesome comics talent like Becky Cloonan (BATMAN), Gabriel Ba and Fabio Moon (DAYTRIPPER), Jeff Lemire (SWEET TOOTH), Greg Rucka (The Punisher, BATWOMAN), Gail Simone (BATGIRL) and many more!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-04 22:31:11. [CVDB423627] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 04:40:03. [Issue ID 1140015]
